You\'re about to delete this list. Are you sure you have finished with it?
Are you sure you wish to delete this message?
Te invito a probar la app Distarea. Compra con tu móvil en las tiendas de siempre. Descárgala aquí: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.disoft.distarea
files have been attached to the copy of this e-mail message:
Se ha adjuntado un archivo a la copia por e-mail de este mensaje:
Small vibration when pressing soft buttons
You\'re about to erase all items from this shipping. Are you sure?
Items will be stored in history, which can be accessed through the magnifying-glass, for easier next shopping list creation. Should I continue?
You\'re about to remove all checked items. Are you sure?
You\'re about to set as acquired and store into history all checked items. Rest will stay as pending. Do you wish to continue?
No conversations have started. You can send a message to a favorite establishment using the button in the corner.

Como cliente habitual de su empresa y con el afán de mejorar y agilizar las vías de comunicación entre ambos, le invito a utilizar DISTAREA.

Se trata de una aplicación GRATUITA, apta para uso en dispositivos móviles Android, que le permitiría enviarme sus ofertas y promociones y a mí realizar pedidos.

Para obtener más información o darse de alta, solo tiene que acceder a través del siguiente enlace: http://www.distarea.es

Si así lo hace, le agradecería que me lo comunicara utilizando el sistema propio de mensajería que incorpora la aplicación

Para cualquier otra duda no dude en contactar con nosotros 

Mis datos
Nombre:
Downloading all items from Establishment\'s Virtual Store...
These are the establishments that we have recorded at your influence zone:\n
Wrong register code. Please check it.
The virtual store you\'re trying to acces is not available at this moment. Contact the establishment\'s owner, or try again later.
This establishment has not developed an internal review or promotion date has passed.
Use an easy-to-remember username: e-mail, nickname,…
Id already taken. You have to pick another one.

We searched for your data at our Databse, but there were no matches. Please, fill the next fields, to complete a registry, and touch "Confirm" to finish. If you do not wish to create a new account, please, get out of the app and restart it to try again.
Do you wish to add an item now?
Check your e-mail. It is not valid.
An invitation e-mail has been sent to
Your going to permanently delete this item from the history. Are you sure?
There are no establishments so you can only create shopping lists. If you wish to invite or locate one, you can do so at the action bar above.
No establishment has invited you yet. If you have an invitation code, you can use it at the top-right corner menu.
Connection failure, try again. Message stored.
You have a new message from
la composición de la ventana de adjuntos. Ambos usan el flag
from your message. This does NOT erase your device file. Are you sure you want to continue?
You are about to remove the attachment
Asks for user\'s password before important actions
There are no registered establishments. Later, you\'ll be able to invite them, or search them by their establishment\'s name.
Currently, there is one establishment at your influence zone.
Add items to your list to avoid forgetting them. When you get to be at the establishment, check the acquired items.
To delete or edit an item, long-press the item line. For finishing the shipping, press the arrow button at the Total line.
No items meet your searching criteria.
No messages have been sent yet
You have no establishment marked as favorite to be able to communicate. You can add one at the Establishment menu.
You have no pending or previous shippings. Press + button to create one.
No Internet connection detected. Check your settings, and try to reconnect.
There was a problem sending an invitation e-mail to
No messages have been received yet
has been connected to your establishment.
Do not show this message again.
Items from previous shippings have been added. Do you want to add a new one?
You must define a business activity
A company cannot engage more than 5 activities at the same time.
Do you wish to download ALL the establishments of the new area of influence?
Check the \ Company Name \ field, it can not be empty
Check the new fields: Company Name and Branch Code.
Searches if you have a shop where you receive messages
You do not have synchronized establishments.
Check your e-mail. It is invalid.
Attention! The following options may remove important information from the application, causing errors, permanent data loss and application failures. Are you sure of what you are doing?
Watch out! Do not enter if you do not know what you do
All the establishments has been deleted
The establishments messages has been reseted
Attention! It will delete ALL downloaded establishments, and backorders. This information will NOT be recovered. Are you sure?
All establishments will be removed from the internal database
Allows you to view the Priority Message of the establishments
The password must have 20 characters max.
At the "Establishments" process, you\'ll be able to include some from other zones, or invite them to join.
Connection to the Establishment could not be reached. Please, check your Internet connection, and try again later. Your shipping has been marked as "closed".
There was a problem sending your shipping. Please, try again later.
Your shipping has been successfully sent.
You\'re about to create list. This list cannot be sent to a establishment.
In this process you can create a shopping list for inner use, which cannot be sent. If you wish to do that, use an establishment from the dropdown menu.
No items from previous shippings have been selected. By selecting them now, you will save time refilling amounts and prices. Are you sure you want to go on?
You have not selected any items from your previous order. Select now will save you having to re-set prices and quantities. Are you sure you want to continue?
I certify to be of age and have read and accept the terms and conditions of use
Check your choices. You\'re about to finish.
You must enter a registration code for the Auto mode
You are creating a new user.
If you belong to a Branch or Department, insert your branch code here:
We need you to tell us your postal code, to know in which zone you live at, and which establishments can reach you.
Do you wish to save this address as default, for future deliveries? (You will be asked for address, but will be autofilled with this one).
The barcode inserted already exists in another article
We have identified the following lack of information:\n
To register, you must have Internet access.
You can retrieve items created by pressing ···
\n\t· The user name and nickname are the same
Send order copy to my email
To complete the information needed to order, please go to Settings -> User Data, or press the left button.
You can also insert an invitation code if an establishment granted you one.

CONDITIONS OF USE AND PRIVACY.

El usuario reconoce ser mayor de edad y que no cuenta con ningún tipo de impedimento legal para el uso de esta aplicación. Esta prohibido el uso de esta aplicación que incluya contenidos de tipo sexual o de acciones o procesos que cuenten con impedimentos legales en su país de origen.

El uso de DISTAREA no supone que el usuario esté obligado a facilitar ninguna información sobre si mismo. En el caso de que proporcione el usuario alguna información de carácter personal, los datos recogidos serán utilizados con la finalidad, en la forma y con las limitaciones y derechos que recoge la Ley Orgánica 15/1999, de Protección de Datos de Carácter Personal y sus normas de desarrollo. Los datos facilitados por los usuarios serán incorporados a los ficheros de carácter personal de los que es responsable DISOFT, donde serán conservados de forma confidencial.

DISOFT procederá a la cancelación de los datos recogidos cuando dejen de ser necesarios o pertinentes para la finalidad para la que hubiesen sido recabados o registrados. En el caso de que los datos recogidos se utilizasen para una finalidad distinta para la cual hubiesen sido recabados o recogidos se requerirá el consentimiento previo de los interesados. Los usuarios cuyos datos sean objeto de tratamiento podrán ejercitar gratuitamente los derechos de oposición, acceso e información, rectificación, cancelación de sus datos y revocación de su autorización sin efectos retroactivos en los términos especificados en la Ley Orgánica 15/1999, de Protección de Datos de Carácter Personal, conforme al procedimiento legalmente establecido. Estos derechos podrán ser ejercitados dirigiendo comunicación por escrito al domicilio del DISOFT sito en la calle Federico Viera número 163 de Las Palmas de Gran Canaria (35012) o a través de de correo electrónico en la siguiente dirección administracion@disoftweb.com

En el caso de que los usuarios debieran facilitar su dirección de correo electrónico para acceder a algunos de los servicios ofertados o para identificarse voluntariamente, podrán manifestar que no desean recibir ningún tipo de comunicación que pudiese enviar, siempre que no esté ligada estrictamente a la finalidad para la que se solicitó el servicio. DISOFT pone a disposición de los usuarios un correo electrónico donde puede manifestar su intención de darse de baja de la lista de contactos: administracion@disoftweb.com. La aceptación de estas condiciones de uso y de privacidad conllevan la implícita renuncia a su fuero propio si lo tuvieran y se someten a los Juzgados y Tribunales de Las Palmas de G.C. ESPAÑA, para cualquier cuestión litigiosa que se deriven.
This app has been developed by
\nSoluciones informáticas a la medida de su empresa.
Are you sure you want to add this contact to your Device\'s Contact List?
Do you have an issue you can\'t resolve, even after looking for it at the help guide? Have you found a bug in the app? Do you have ideas to improve it? Tell us everything in this window!
Write postal code or part of the establishment\'s name you wish to connect to.
Are you sure you want to erase this item from current shipping?

Erasing this item will not delete it from this shipping, since it has already been sent, but if you did a copy of it, it would not be included. Are you sure you want to erase this item from your next shipping?
You\'re about to create a new shipping from scratch, which will overwrite this one. Are you sure you wish to continue?
You\'re about to create a new shipping. Are you sure you wish to continue?
You\'re about to make a new shipping with the items you asked for last time. Are you sure you wish to continue?
Before sending your shipping\'s info, choose between deliver, or pickup.
Would you like to add an establishment? Send an invitation e-mail:
There are no files to add
If this list or establishment has previous shippings, you can access their items with the magnifying glass button, located at the top-left corner.
Select type of establishments you\'re interested in. A los NO seleccionados no se les podrá localizar ni crear pedidos.
Select the activities of your company. You must select at least one.
Here you can edit your list\'s name, or delete it.
Which currency will you use when shopping?
Do you wish to activate Safe mode? (Your password will be asked for different functions of the app)

If you forget your password, we need a way to recognize you. We let you choose between a mail adress, or a secret question and answer. We recommend to use your e-mail, since you\'ll need that for placing orders.
If you forget your password, we need a way to recognize you.
Are you a private user, or an enterprise?
You have a new establishment.\n\n -Touch here to see it-
You have a new message.\n\n -Touch here to see it-
Username already taken, and wrong password.\nCheck your password, or use other username to create a new account.
Turns on / off vibration for new messages
